typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		SRC1_SOURCE1_ID as integer,
		SRC1_SOURCE2_REF_ID as integer,
		SRC1_SOURCE3_REF_ID as integer,
		SRC1_NCHAR_VALUE1 as string,
		SRC1_NCHAR_VALUE2 as string,
		SRC1_NUMERIC_VALUE1 as decimal(18,4),
		SRC1_NUMERIC_VALUE2 as decimal(18,4),
		SRC1_DATETIME_VALUE1 as timestamp,
		SRC1_DATETIME_VALUE2 as timestamp,
		SRC1_CDC_TIMESTAMP as timestamp,
		SRC2_SOURCE2_ID as integer,
		SRC2_NCHAR_VALUE1 as string,
		SRC2_NCHAR_VALUE2 as string,
		SRC2_NUMERIC_VALUE1 as decimal(18,4),
		SRC2_NUMERIC_VALUE2 as decimal(18,4),
		SRC2_DATETIME_VALUE1 as timestamp,
		SRC2_DATETIME_VALUE2 as timestamp,
		SRC3_SOURCE3_ID as integer,
		SRC3_NCHAR_VALUE1 as string,
		SRC3_NCHAR_VALUE2 as string,
		SRC3_NUMERIC_VALUE1 as decimal(18,4),
		SRC3_NUMERIC_VALUE2 as decimal(18,4),
		SRC3_DATETIME_VALUE1 as timestamp,
		SRC3_DATETIME_VALUE2 as timestamp,
		DSS_CREATE_TIME as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'parquet') ~> Source
source(output(
		DIMENSION1_KEY as integer,
		SOURCE2_ID as integer,
		NCHAR_ATTRIBUTE1 as string,
		NCHAR_ATTRIBUTE2 as string,
		DATETIME_ATTRIBUTE1 as timestamp,
		DATETIME_ATTRIBUTE2 as timestamp,
		DSS_CREATE_TIME as timestamp,
		DSS_UPDATE_TIME as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'select * from TMPL_DIMENSION1 d where exists (select 1 from ADLS_TMPL_STAGING_KEY k where k.SRC1_SOURCE2_REF_ID = d.SOURCE2_ID)',
	format: 'query',
	staged: false) ~> Dimension1
source(output(
		DIMENSION2_KEY as integer,
		SOURCE3_ID as integer,
		NCHAR_ATTRIBUTE1 as string,
		NCHAR_ATTRIBUTE2 as string,
		DATETIME_ATTRIBUTE1 as timestamp,
		DATETIME_ATTRIBUTE2 as timestamp,
		DSS_CREATE_TIME as timestamp,
		DSS_UPDATE_TIME as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'select * from TMPL_DIMENSION2 d where exists (select 1 from ADLS_TMPL_STAGING_KEY k where k.SRC1_SOURCE3_REF_ID = d.SOURCE3_ID)',
	format: 'query',
	staged: false) ~> Dimension2
source(output(
		DIMENSION1_KEY as integer,
		DIMENSION2_KEY as integer,
		SOURCE1_ID as integer,
		SRC1_MEASURE1 as decimal(18,4),
		SRC1_MEASURE2 as decimal(18,4),
		SRC2_MEASURE1 as decimal(18,4),
		SRC2_MEASURE2 as decimal(18,4),
		SRC3_MEASURE1 as decimal(18,4),
		SRC3_MEASURE2 as decimal(18,4),
		SRC1_CDC_TIMESTAMP as timestamp,
		DSS_CREATE_TIME as timestamp,
		DSS_UPDATE_TIME as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> Fact
Source select(mapColumn(
		each(match(true()),
			'SOURCE_'+$$ = $$)
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectSource
SelectSource, Dimension1 lookup(SOURCE_SRC1_SOURCE2_REF_ID == SOURCE2_ID,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> LookupDimension1
LookupDimension1 select(mapColumn(
		each(match(left(name,length('SOURCE_'))=='SOURCE_')),
		each(match(right(name,length('_KEY'))=='_KEY'))
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
Select1, Dimension2 lookup(SOURCE_SRC1_SOURCE3_REF_ID == SOURCE3_ID,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> LookupDimension2
LookupDimension2 select(mapColumn(
		each(match(left(name,length('SOURCE_'))=='SOURCE_')),
		each(match(right(name,length('_KEY'))=='_KEY'))
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select2
Fact select(mapColumn(
		each(match(true()),
			'FACT_'+$$ = $$)
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectFact
Select2, SelectFact lookup(SOURCE_SRC1_SOURCE1_ID == FACT_SOURCE1_ID,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> LookupFact
LookupFact select(mapColumn(
		SOURCE1_ID = SOURCE_SRC1_SOURCE1_ID,
		SRC1_CDC_TIMESTAMP = SOURCE_SRC1_CDC_TIMESTAMP,
		DSS_CREATE_TIME = FACT_DSS_CREATE_TIME,
		each(match(right(name,length('_KEY'))=='_KEY'&&left(name,length('FACT_'))!='FACT_')),
		each(match(left(name,length('SOURCE_'))=='SOURCE_'&&instr(name,'NUMERIC')>0),
			replace(right($$,length($$)-length('SOURCE_')),'NUMERIC_VALUE','MEASURE') = $$)
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select3
Select3 derive(each(match(right(name,length('_KEY'))=='_KEY'), $$ = iifNull($$, 0)),
		DSS_CREATE_TIME = iif(isNull(DSS_CREATE_TIME), currentTimestamp(), DSS_CREATE_TIME),
		DSS_UPDATE_TIME = currentTimestamp()) ~> DerivedColumns
DerivedColumns alterRow(upsertIf(true())) ~> AlterRow
AlterRow sink(skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> FactSink
